https://tmrev.io/movie/228204-Bayou Blue 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pilO3O9Vz4dITWyaNTtRmFtnVQB.jpg From 1997 to 2006, serial killer Ronald Dominique raped and killed twenty-three men in poverty- stricken Southeastern Louisiana. Difficulties in apprehending Dominique ranged from the underfunding of law enforcement to a lack of family advocacy for the victims, to the general distraction by other catastrophes such as Hurricane Katrina. Bayou Blue meditates on the decay of a community. Bayou Blue
